name: ColorCodeConvert
shortDescription: Expression that convert between hex color code and RGB color string that Gdevelop use.
description: Expression that convert between Hex and Dec, both input and output is string, not numbers.
ToDec: Convert Hex Color (e.g. FEFCFB) to RGB Color (254;252;251)
ToHex: Convert RGB Color (e.g. 82;183;136) to Hex Color (52B788)
LerpColorDec: Transfer from RGB Color A to RGB Color B by lerp
LerpColorHex: Transfer from Hex Color A to Hex Color B by lerp

eventsFunctions.description: Convert hex color code to RGB decimal color.
eventsFunctions.name: ToDec

events.comment:
Color set to zero if not between 0 to 15(F).
Repeat 6 time for all 6 digits.

eventsFunctions.description: Convert RGB decimal color to hex color code.
eventsFunctions.name: ToHex

events.comment: Get red color and convert to hex.
Get green color and convert to hex.
Get blue color and convert to hex.

parameters:
VariableString(__ColorDecText[0])+
VariableString(__ColorDecText[1])+
VariableString(__ColorDecText[2])+
VariableString(__ColorDecText[3])+
VariableString(__ColorDecText[4])+
VariableString(__ColorDecText[5])

eventsFunctions.description: Transfer from color A to color B for decimal colors code.
eventsFunctions.name: LerpColorDec

events.comment: seperate red, green and blue value, lerp all 3 value, than join as string.

eventsFunctions.description: Transfer from color A to color B for hexadecimal colors code.
eventsFunctions.name: LerpColorHex

events.comment:
hex color will convert by ToHex expression first.
seperate red, green and blue value.
lerp all 3 value, than join as string.
